script.input: select *, regexp_extract(query_hash, '[0-9a-zA-Z]+\.([0-9a-zA-Z]+)\.[0-9a-zA-Z]+', 1) as query_hash_1, regexp_extract(query_hash, '[0-9a-zA-Z]+\.[0-9a-zA-Z]+\.([0-9a-zA-Z]+)', 1) as literals_hash, (query like 'EXPLAIN (SQL internal_spark,%') as is_explain, (query like '%select distinct count(*)%') as is_count_star from iceberg.some_events.some_queries where (tenant = 'a360/prod3/foo' or tenant = 'a360/prod/bar') and query_metrics like '%raw_sql%' and event_timestamp >= current_timestamp - interval '30' day

select event_timestamp, elapsed, processed_rows_byol, workload_name, regexp_extract(pre_execution_query_metrics, '"federation-push-down-inhibitors":({.*}),"', 1) as inhibitors, query_plan from iceberg.some_events.some_queries where tenant = 'a360/prod/foo' and event_timestamp > cast ('2025-04-14' as timestamp) and processed_rows_byol > 0 order by 3 desc
